Text: Algonquin Power & Utilities Corp (NYSE:AQN) Declares Quarterly Dividend of $0.14 . Investors of record on Monday, September 30th will be given a dividend of 0.142 per share by the utilities provider on Tuesday, October 15th. This represents a $0.57 annualized dividend and a yield of 4.13%.
Cause: Algonquin Power & Utilities Corp (NYSE:AQN) Declares Quarterly Dividend of $0.14 .
Effect: Investors of record on Monday, September 30th will be given a dividend of 0.142 per share by the utilities provider on Tuesday, October 15th.
